alert.note: Alert for De Kalb (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 1:12PM CDT until August 10 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following counties, De Kalb, Jackson, Overton, Putnam and White. * WHEN...Until 415 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 112 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cookeville, Sparta, Smithville, Gainesboro, Algood, Baxter, Burgess Falls State Park, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads, Cummins Falls State Park, Edgar Evans State Park and Rickman. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
